message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me in the middle at $110?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $115, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can we meet in the middle at $117.50?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about we do $112.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, Bob. I can do $113, but I'm still a bit above $112.50. How about we try $114?
I'm getting close, but I still think we can do better. How about $111?
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're getting too close to the minimum price I'm willing to sell for. I can do $112, but I think that's as low as I can go. Can you meet me at $112?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still willing to negotiate. How about $111.50?
